  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.dcm.broadcast.DCMBroadcastService
    since 6.8.0
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGConfigurationChangeReceiver
    since 6.6.0
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGConfigurationChangeService
    since 6.6.0. CPS component will directly invoke MG APIs.
  • Deprecated Exceptions
    Exceptions
    Description
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.exception.MGRuntimeException
    since 6.6

  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.cdcvm.DeviceCVMVerifier.confirmCredential(CharSequence, CharSequence)
    6.4.0, use DeviceCVMVerifier.startAuthentication(DeviceCVMVerifierInput) instead.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.dcm.WalletPinManager.askWalletPinForLVT(boolean)
    this API is deprecated since 6.5.0. To enforce WalletPIN LVT payment with authentication, refer to CustomConfiguration.Builder to enforce authentication for LVT transaction.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.dcm.WalletPinManager.isAskWalletPinForLVT()
    this API is deprecated since 6.5.0. To enforce WalletPIN LVT payment with authentication, refer to CustomConfiguration.Builder to enforce authentication for LVT transaction.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.enrollment.TermsAndConditions.getText()
    since 6.10.0, please use TermsAndConditions.getContent() instead.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGCardEnrollmentService.checkCardEligibility(byte[], InputMethod, String, WalletAccountData, CardEligibilityListener, String)
    6.7.0, please use MGCardEnrollmentService.checkEligibility(EligibilityData, InstrumentData, CardEligibilityListener) instead.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGCardEnrollmentService.checkCardEligibility(byte[], InputMethod, String, CardEligibilityListener, String)
    6.7.0, please use MGCardEnrollmentService.checkEligibility(EligibilityData, InstrumentData, CardEligibilityListener) instead.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGTransactionRecord.getDigitalCardId()
    since 6.12
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MGWalletConfiguration.Builder.setNotification(Notification)
    since 6.7.5 : Notification Object is no longer used
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.MobileGatewayManager.resetSDKStorage(Context, MGConfigurationResetListener)
    since 6.6, it is not recommended to call this API alone. To avoid de-synchronization of walletId, it is recommended to call wipe from SDKDataController.wipeAll(android.content.Context) which also helps to wipe MG.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.engine.MasterCardTransactionContext.getTransactionId()
    since 6.10.0 : Use TransactionContext.getTrxId()
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.experience.PaymentExperienceSettings.checkPaymentExperienceSupport(Context, PaymentExperience)
    6.7.0 it is no longer advised for usage. With performance improvements done, MPA could adopt to PaymentExperience.ONE_TAP_ENABLED directly.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.experience.PaymentExperienceSettings.checkPaymentExperienceSupport(Context, PaymentExperience, int)
    6.7.0 it is no longer advised for usage. With performance improvements done, MPA could adopt to PaymentExperience.ONE_TAP_ENABLED directly.
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.activate(DigitalizedCard, PaymentType, PaymentServiceListener)
    since SDK v4.1. refer to PaymentBusinessService.activateNonDefaultCard(String, PaymentType, PaymentServiceListener, CardActivationListener).
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.activateCard(String, PaymentType, PaymentServiceListener, CardActivationListener)
     
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.generateQRCodePaymentData(String, PaymentServiceListener)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentBusinessService.getAuthenticationFlowPriorToPayment(PaymentServiceListener, PaymentType)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentSettings.getDisableDeactivationOnPosDisconnect()
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.PaymentSettings.setDisableDeactivationOnPosDisconnect(boolean)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.sdkconfig.SDKInitializer.configure(Context, Notification, CustomConfiguration)
    6.8.0 : Use SDKInitializer.configure(Context, CustomConfiguration)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.sdkconfig.SDKInitializer.initialize(Context, Notification, CustomConfiguration)
    since 6.8.0 : Use SDKInitializer.initialize(Context, CustomConfiguration)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.sdkconfig.SDKInitializer.initialize(Context, SDKControllerListener, Notification)
    since 6.8.0 : Use SDKInitializer.initialize(Context, SDKControllerListener)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.sdkconfig.SDKInitializer.initialize(Context, SDKControllerListener, Notification, CustomConfiguration)
    since 6.8.0 : Use SDKInitializer.initialize(Context,CustomConfiguration, SDKControllerListener)
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.sdkconfig.SDKController.addService(String, BusinessService)
    since 6.6 - no operation
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.sdkconfig.SDKController.forceAddService(String, BusinessService)
    since 6.6 - no operation
    com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.sdkconfig.SDKController.getService(String)
    since 6.6 - Service object can be obtained from different BusinessManager class
